overview: The Pirate Bikers, lead by Bugis, share a deep, common interest in their Superbikes. After years of illegal racing on the streets, they are now eager to compete on real race tracks. After a fateful meeting with Pak Hamid, who is a veteran racer, and receiving tutelage from him, the Pirate Bikers feel ready to take on that challenge.
title: Superbike
